verbose_text: Importantly, functional analysis in human and yeast cells shows that lack of MFAP1 / Spp381 confers a genome instability that, in contrast with THO mutants, is not mediated by R-loops (XREF_FIG, XREF_FIG, and XREF_FIG).
evidence: genome instability that, in contrast with THO mutants, is not mediated by R-loops
